lunaineq: Tools for Analyzing Health Inequality Metrics 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
Tools for computing and interpreting health inequality metrics, including absolute and relative gaps, regression-based measures and disproportionality-based indices. Supports both disaggregated data (numerator/denominator) and aggregated indicators with population weights. Provides automatic interpretations in Spanish, English, French and Portuguese, and is designed for epidemiological and public-health monitoring applications.
